storyInfo: The Exemplars, led by Vina, press forward relentlessly after breaking through the blockade at the city walls. Before the final battle, Vina hands the Realmblade to the people. She rallies soldiers, workers, and all manner of city dwellers to storm the Sarkaz's final stronghold together.

attributes.content: <p=1>Auchterigg Front Lines, T1</><p=2>October 2nd, 1098, 6:23 A.M. - The Day the War Ended</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: Death... awaits... at the end...
attributes.name: Sudaram

attributes.content: My liege... watches... death, watches... you...
attributes.name: Sudaram

attributes.content: Captain, the target has been neutralized! But our remaining ammunition is estimated to last only two more minutes!
attributes.name: Excited Soldier

attributes.content: We need our next set of orders!
attributes.name: Excited Soldier

attributes.content: All units, prepare for close-quarter combat!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Hold the line for the next two minutes—I'll cover your retreat!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Siege, our artillery support is running out!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: The bombardment will end in three minutes! What's the situation on your side?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: We can't clear this Nachzehrer fog!
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: These things have severed the supply routes our workers cleared for us. We can't get supplies to your position quickly enough.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Prepare to retreat from T1.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Negative! Abandoning T1 will create a gap in our encirclement, and the alliance forces will break through from our side! Captain, I can't accept that—
attributes.name: Excited Soldier

attributes.content: The battlefield isn't a place for heroics! Honor your orders!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: We've sent a distress signal to our friends at Rhodes Island. Now we have to trust the Doctor and the plan.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Soldiers, we've made it home. Do everything you can to survive! Only then can we take back what we've lost!
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Siege, we'll hold the line for the final two minutes, then retreat to regroup and assist you in clearing out the creatures in the fog!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Bagpipe, keep them safe!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Aye, Captain!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: If the fog can't be dispersed, don't wait for us. Head to I12 and rendezvous with Gododdin's 106th Assault Brigade. Keep fighting.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I'll be seein' ye soon, Captain—
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: (Strange howl)
attributes.name: Voice from the Communicator

attributes.content: Look out, Siege!
attributes.name: Bagpipe

attributes.content: It's the Confessarius chimeras! Everyone, prepare to retreat!
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: (Song-like shriek)
attributes.name: Voice from the Communicator

attributes.content: It's lit itself up! Hannah, watch out for its flames!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Oof... It hurts... Vina, are you alright?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Everyone else, fall back! I can't allow any more needless sacrifices...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: (A piercing wail)
attributes.name: Voice from the Communicator

attributes.content: Wait—where did this backup come from!?
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Anti-witchcraft cannon has struck the target. Enemy movement disrupted. Remaining squads, continue setting up anti-witchcraft cannons.
attributes.name: Unknown Transmission

attributes.content: Mission objective: eliminate threats within the fog.
attributes.name: Unknown Transmission

attributes.content: Friendly forces at T1, hold your position. Emergency supplies will arrive at your location in three and a half minutes.
attributes.name: Unknown Transmission

attributes.content: Exemplar T1 Combat Team—message received! Please identify your unit!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Duke of Normandy's 8th Grenadier Battalion, under orders to support The Exemplars.
attributes.name: Unknown Transmission

attributes.content: The Duke of Normandy? 8th Grenadier Battalion? Horn, do you know anything about this unit?
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: They're not under the direct command of the Duke of Normandy. They report to the Earl of March.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Lieutenant Skamandros truly has an exceptional grasp of our intelligence operations, as to be expected from someone born into a military family.
attributes.name: The Young Duke

attributes.content: Lieutenant, keep Her Royal Highness Alexandrina safe.
attributes.name: The Young Duke

attributes.content: As for Your Highness, please accept this small gift.
attributes.name: The Young Duke

attributes.content: Once all these matters are resolved, I'll visit you in person, Vina.
attributes.name: The Young Duke

attributes.content: Siege, do you know the Earl of March?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: No, we've never met. But her name was mentioned in some of the information sent to me.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: That doesn't matter now. With reinforcements, we should be able to reopen the supply line. Horn, we'll meet again soon!
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: At last, it's time to bring all of this to an end.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Finally!
attributes.name: Excited Soldier

attributes.content: The crowd cheers.
Phew—
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: She gazes at The Shard in the distance and the faintly visible Palace of Westhaleg, calmer than she has ever been.
Triangle, Cello, Oboe... Tempest Platoon, everyone, watch closely.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: ...As we scatter the dark clouds over Londinium!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: All members of the Exemplar T1 Combat Team, hear this: hold your ground. Do not give them a single inch!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: 'Roger that!'
<p=1>Highbury Secret Base</><p=2>October 2nd, 1098 6:36 A.M.</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: Captain, Rock-18 just uploaded the scan of the last segment of our route to PRTS. Did you receive it?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Got it! Rockrock, we're already repairing the final track-shift node.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Given the current damage level, how long until the repairs are complete?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Ten minutes.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Located Granny yet? We need to retrieve that weapon as soon as possible. The Exemplars will need our support on the front line.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Still trying to pinpoint the correct location.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: The signals we've found over the past few days were all decoy beacons they left behind. It might take a bit more time to re-establish contact.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: At least that means Granny's team is still safe for now...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Captain, if—and I mean if—we can't get in touch with Catherine, what should we do?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: We'll use this passage to transport as much of Highbury's remaining supplies as possible to—
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Captain?!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: *cough*—
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: *cough* Is everyone okay?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Where did those Sarkaz come from... and what was that artillery fire I just heard?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: The smoke shifts, yet a small ember glimmers brightly in the depths of the haze...
The ember of a cigarette.
A familiar, acrid smell hits Feist's nose and makes his eyes sting.
I keep telling you, when you're busy working, you always forget to watch your back.
Welcome home, brat.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Granny! We've been looking for you all this time!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: I know. When someone told me the passage was being repaired, I figured it was you.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: That's—
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: He spots a massive shadow in the depths of the smoke.
Haha, remember the blueprints you left behind?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: It took some effort, with the Sarkaz blockade and all, but we finally managed to build your big machine.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: The Crawler...
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: <p=1>Sudean Secret Underground Passage</><p=2>October 2nd, 1098 6:39 A.M.</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: I know you're there.
attributes.name: Millscar

attributes.content: Your earring has grown... rather warm.
attributes.name: Millscar

attributes.content: Those workers who came to support the Self-Salvation Corps earlier—that was your doing, wasn't it?
attributes.name: Millscar

attributes.content: Shh, you'll disturb my friends.
attributes.name: Mysterious Vampire

attributes.content: Still, thank you for taking good care of Little Garnet for me, kitten.
attributes.name: Mysterious Vampire

attributes.content: And thank you for cleaning up those filthy rocks Duq'arael left behind.
attributes.name: Mysterious Vampire

attributes.content: Here. You can have this back.
attributes.name: Millscar

attributes.content: I have more important things to deal with.
attributes.name: Millscar

attributes.content: Off to find that hunk of sheetmetal again?
attributes.name: Mysterious Vampire

attributes.content: He… wouldn't want to miss this battle.
attributes.name: Millscar

attributes.content: Thank you for saving me earlier. Farewell.
attributes.name: Millscar

attributes.content: Where are you off to next?
attributes.name: Mysterious Vampire

attributes.content: To meet with him.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: You're not going to go help Dame Kal'tsit?
attributes.name: Mysterious Vampire

attributes.content: With Amiya and Logos there, nothing will happen.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: I'll wait for them beneath the Palace of Westhaleg. It's his last known location, as far as I know.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Her Highness is gone. It's time to put the past to rest.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Your wounds...
attributes.name: Mysterious Vampire

attributes.content: Insignificant.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: You don't need to involve yourself in the frontline work anymore. Take care of yourself.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Don't you understand how powerful I am by now, runt? You learned quite a bit from us back in the day, didn't you?
attributes.name: Mysterious Vampire

attributes.content: Bringing you into the city was the most I could do. Whatever is between you and the Regent—Rose Riverside will no longer be involved.
attributes.name: Mysterious Vampire

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Where will you go next?
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: I'll keep tracking her down. She disappeared so suddenly, abandoning Her Highness at the most critical moment. That demands an explanation.
attributes.name: Mysterious Vampire

attributes.content: One of our sharp-eyed sisters managed to track her as she left Londinium. She's still heading west, though her destination is unclear.
attributes.name: Mysterious Vampire

attributes.content: And when you catch her? Will you bring her back, or kill her?
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: She owes all the Riverbank Canoes an explanation.
attributes.name: Mysterious Vampire

attributes.content: But you, runt, should worry about yourself first. The Regent is close at hand.
attributes.name: Mysterious Vampire

attributes.content: The Riverside Canoes swore not to get involved with anything related to Babel anymore. However, helping an old acquaintance doesn't break the rules.
attributes.name: Mysterious Vampire

attributes.content: This smear of blood—it's a gift and a blessing, for less pain and fewer scars. Safe travels, Ascalon.
attributes.name: Mysterious Vampire

attributes.content: Did you really have to wipe it on my neck?
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Not my fault you always hide your face so well under that hood. You look better this way.
attributes.name: Mysterious Vampire

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: Oh, by the way, I forgot to ask—what do you think of that kitten?
attributes.name: Mysterious Vampire

attributes.content: She does not emerge from the shadows, and the wind carries her voice.
'My judgment is unnecessary. When the dust settles, the truth will reveal itself.'
'We're all the same.'

attributes.text: Even today, many still argue about when exactly the war ended.
\nSome say it was when the Nachzehrer King fell at the gates of the Palace of Westhaleg. Others say it was when the Sarkaz fully withdrew from Londinium.
\nAs someone who lived through it, I've been asked quite frequently about my opinion.
Luckily, I share the exact same view as Vina:
\nThe war ended the moment we found the courage to take the sword from Vina's hands and wield it against the Nachzehrer King ourselves.
\nWe fought back. We destroyed, with our own hands, the enemies who tried to ruin us. We never needed a singular hero.
That day, everyone who fought for her home and her future was a hero.

attributes.content: 'Everyone, no matter your unit number, which squad you belong to, or which duke you serve—'
'There's no retreating now!'
'Support the allied forces! Why should we lag behind this lot?'
'Quick, go help The Exemplars!'
'Captain, argh—my weapon's broken—'
'Take mine! If it breaks, grab another! If there's none left, snatch a blade from the devils and keep fighting!'
'Advance! Advance!!'
'For Victoria!'
'For Victoria!'
Soldier, you should not continue this assault empty-handed.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Take this sword.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: ...but, this is the Sighs of Kings... I can't possibly...
attributes.name: Diane Weber

attributes.content: It belongs to Your Royal Highness.
attributes.name: Diane Weber

attributes.content: No. It belongs to Victoria.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: On the wreckage of the Glorious, trusted allies passed the sword from hand to hand until it reached me, completing its mission.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Now, take it from my hand! Let it reach the hands of everyone who needs it. Let its mission continue anew.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: This is your right as a Victorian.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: But if we take the sword, what will Your Royal Highness use?
attributes.name: Diane Weber

attributes.content: I still have my hammer.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: I will not stop. I will stay with you until the end.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: The early morning sun breaks through the dark clouds. A golden-haired Feline and a Victorian stand together.
The soldier grips the sword tightly, her gaze locked on the determined Aslan, despite the blinding sunlight.
She refuses to look away, for she sees the thousands of Victorians rallied behind her, fighting for the same cause.
She sees the King, walking alongside her people.
As you bid.
attributes.name: Diane Weber

attributes.content: All survivors of the 6th Column, 10th Infantry Regiment, advance with me!
attributes.name: Diane Weber

attributes.content: For Victoria!
attributes.name: Diane Weber

attributes.content: ♪May the vast lands they keep owre kynge.
attributes.name: Diane Weber

attributes.content: She cuts down two Nachzehrer Royal Court elites and a caster. Her blade bears two new notches.
♪His people, and alle his well-wyllynge,
attributes.name: Diane Weber

attributes.content: However, she is too gravely injured to continue, so she passes the sword on.
A worker grips the sword and presses forward. He perishes alongside a Royal Court elite, leaving yet another notch on the blade.
♪And give them grace wythoute endyng!
attributes.name: Diane Weber

attributes.content: An Infected picks the sword up from the pool of blood. She does not defeat any enemies, instead protecting it with her body.
In so doing, she protects her Victoria and hope itself.
♪Then may we call and savely syng,
attributes.name: Diane Weber

attributes.content: ♪Victoria, yeve thankes for owre hom!
attributes.name: Diane Weber

attributes.text: Finally, the sword pierced the Nachzehrer King, after which it disappeared into the chaos of the battle.
\nTo this day, we still don't know who the final hero to wield the sword was, or whether they're still alive. But one thing is certain—the sword fulfilled its mission.
\nThe Victorians wielded the blade against the invaders.
But its legend didn't end there. They say it was the workers who recovered the broken Sighs of Kings from the blood and mud.
\nAs for the rest of the story, well, every child in Londinium can sing it loud and clear.

attributes.content: <p=1>Auchterigg, the Nachzehrers' final camp</><p=2>October 2nd, 1098, 7:35 A.M.</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: I don't see any more Nachzehrers. Is the battle finally over?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: But this blasted fog hasn't let up one bit.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Something's not right. The Sarkaz aren't attacking under the cover of the thick fog like before. Is this a trap?
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Based on our previous encounters with the Nachzehrer army, they are far more elusive than they seem.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Horn, what do you suppose we should do next?
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Coordinate with the main allied forces, hold off on advancing rashly, and minimize unnecessary casualties until we get a clearer read on the situation.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Alright. Sound strategy.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Dagda, send the orders to all of our troops.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: I'll pass it on to the alliance commanders, as well as Closure and the others.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Hey, heyyy, hey! Did Hood even get the frequency right?
attributes.name: Unknown Transmission

attributes.content: Huh? We're already live?
attributes.name: Unknown Transmission

attributes.content: Gah! Everybody, listen up! Babel's captured the Military Commission's Command Center.
attributes.name: Unknown Transmission

attributes.content: The bastards don't know their heads from their asses right now, and nobody's got it in them to help out the crusty old Nachzehrer King.
attributes.name: Unknown Transmission

attributes.content: So quit wasting time and get those feet moving!
attributes.name: Unknown Transmission

attributes.content: I don't care if you believe me or not, just go and get this over with!
attributes.name: Unknown Transmission

attributes.content: Oh, and by the way, you might wanna look up.
attributes.name: Unknown Transmission

attributes.content: The old hag owes me big this time.
attributes.name: Unknown Transmission

attributes.content: Delphine—
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: We traced the transmission. It seems this communication was received on several different frequencies.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: Both the allies and the Sarkaz probably heard it.
attributes.name: Delphine

attributes.content: That voice... it was....
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Wiš'adel. Sounds like they've been busy.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Horn, please re-assess the situation.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Vina, look at the sky! It's...
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: All eyes turn upwards, and soon they hear the sound of steam bursting at full force, echoing above the Palace of Westhaleg.
'Victoria!'
The Victorian army boils.
It's Charles Lynch! He's gone into the fog!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: I can hear the commotion inside the clouds. He's battling the Nachzehrers.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Horn?
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Although morale is currently high, the alliance has yet to make any major moves. Clearly, the dukes are still hesitating—they have reason to be cautious with intelligence from an unknown source.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: If Rhodes Island trusts Wiš'adel, then so do I.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Ha. We trust you as well, Siege. I'll go tell everyone to get ready.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Huh? What's going on?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Did you hear that sound... right beneath our feet!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: The Exemplars, we meet at last.
Wait a minute, Vina. Am I seeing things, or did a giant... thing just burrow out from underground?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: A giant thing? No. It has a name.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: The Crawler. My grandson designed it. Pretty good, huh?
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: The gray-haired pilot blows a smoke ring, standing proudly on the ladder of the massive machine.
It has four massive steam-powered hydraulic legs, encased in protective armor that bears the unmistakable signs of a worker's handiwork.
Smoke is still billowing from its enormous, black cannon barrel, a clear sign that it was the one responsible for the massive hole in the ground.
A steady stream of Self-Salvation Corps members emerge from the gaping hole beneath The Crawler, carrying combat supplies up to the surface.
You—
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Siege, thank goodness we made it here in time!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Starting now, the Self-Salvation Corps will join forces with you. With Granny and her team helping out, we'll have a much greater chance of victory!
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: We just got that message ourselves—it seems the timing is spot on.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: I-Victoria thanks you!
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Horn?
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: All clear. The preparations are complete, and we're ready to move out at any time.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Everyone, this is the final battle. We—
attributes.name: Vina

attributes.content: Wait a minute. There's still one thing left.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: I need to adjust the cannon.... there. That should do it.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Cover your ears!
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: The cannon strikes the giant bell at the center of Auchterigg, an ancient relic that had stood for centuries.
The bell tolls, loud, clear, and beautiful, followed by the sound of the alliance war horns and their furious battle cries.
We've got to let certain people know we're here.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: You're in command now.
attributes.name: Catherine

attributes.content: Victorians! Charge forth to our final victory!
attributes.name: Vina
